Entries.spring_Mon8:
Hello @! I'm really glad I've gotten to know you.#$b#I want to tell you something; it's a little embarrassing.$4
#$q 134/135 Adult_Followup#I have a hard time thinking of you like you're an adult...
#$r 134 0 Adult_Little#Honestly, I don't really feel like one.
#$r 134 0 Adult_Little#Good! Cause I don't wanna be one.
#$r 135 0 Adult_Big#Not fair! I'm a big kid!
Entries.Adult_Little: Well that's a relief! I was afraid I was reading too far into things.$1#$b#Though, your little potty problems are a dead give away, aren't they little one?$4
Entries.Adult_Big: %Penny giggles sweetly at your comment and pats your head.#$b#Of course you are!$1
Entries.Adult_Followup: #$p 135#I prefer thinking of you as a little kid rather than the big kid you say you are.$4|I'm glad you feel like a little kid!$1#$b#I think I prefer think of you as one.$4
Entries.spring_Tue6: I've always felt comfortable around little kids. I feel more confident.#$e#I feel that way around you too.#$b#I like that.$1
Entries.spring_Wed4: Hello there @. You look happy today.#$b#$y 'Have you been doing better with your potty issues?_Yup! It's easy!_Good! I'm glad to hear it.$1_Not really. I still have accidents..._Oh @. It's okay, that's nothing to be ashamed of. Keep trying your hardest, you'll get it!'
Entries.spring_Thu4: $p 102#We're very lucky to have a library in such a small town.|It doesn't seem like Vincent is going to get out of diapers any time soon...$3#$e#It's pretty clear he's not even trying.
Entries.spring_Fri2:
Hello. Ummm... That old farm must be really distracting$3#$e#...$2 
#$q 130/131 Potty_Followup#Are you having a hard time making it to the potty @?
#$r 130 0 Potty_Trouble#Uh huh. It's too hard. I don't like it.
#$r 130 5 Potty_Trouble#Y-yeah, but I'm trying my best, honest!
#$r 131 -5 Potty_Easy#Ummm... No?
#$r 131 -30 Potty_Easy#That's a really awkward question.
Entries.Potty_Trouble: I thought so. It's okay.#$e#I-if you want I could maybe help... I could check to see if you're doing okay...$4#$b#...$3#$b#If that's okay...$2
Entries.Potty_Easy: Oh... I guess you don't need my help then...$2#$b#I'm sorry I brought it up...$2
Entries.Potty_Followup: #$p 131#I'm sure you can handle it all on your own.|%Penny lowers her voice.#$b#Do you need to check in with your body and see if you need the potty @?$4
Entries.spring_Sat6:
Oh hello @.#$q 132/133 Show_Followup#Oh, do you want to show me something?
#$r 132 0 Show_Nice#Show her the pretty flower you picked.
#$r 132 0 Show_Nice#Show her the cool rock you found in the mines.
#$r 132 0 Show_Nice#Show her your favorite plushie.
#$r 133 0 Show_Diaper#Show her your diaper.
Entries.Show_Nice: Oh wow @, that is very lovely! Thank you for showing me.#$b#You look so pleased! You're just like a little kid at show and tell.$1
Entries.Show_Diaper: Oh goodness @. That doesn't look like you're trying very hard to make it to the potty.$3
Entries.Show_Followup: Well don't you look excited!$1#$e#%Penny pats your head fondly.
Entries.summer_Mon4: Hello there @. You look happy today.#$b#$y 'Have you been doing better with your potty issues?_Yup! It's easy!_Good! I'm glad to hear it.$1_Not really. I still have accidents..._Oh @. It's okay, that's nothing to be ashamed of. Keep trying your hardest, you'll get it!'
Entries.summer_Tue2: #$p 102#I'm tutoring Vincent and Jas today... They're a handful, but it's nice to make a difference in someone's life.|Jas is so proud of her pull ups. I'm really proud to have helped her get there.
Entries.summer_Tue6: #$p 102#I'm tutoring Vincent and Jas today... They're a handful, but it's nice to make a difference in someone's life.|Jas is so proud of her pull ups. I'm really proud to have helped her get there.$1#$b#She's still not great at keeping them clean...$3

Entries.summer_Sat4: I wish I could treat my mom like the toddler she acts like all the time.$3#$e#It would probably be good for her...$2

Hello. Ummm... That old farm must be really distracting$3#$e#...$2

Entries.winter_Fri6: #$p 102#I'm tutoring Vincent and Jas today... They're a handful, but it's nice to make a difference in someone's life.|Jas is so proud of her pull ups. I'm really proud to have helped her get there.$1#$b#She's still not great at keeping them clean...$3

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: On rainy days my thoughts always drift toward cinnamon and cookies.#$b#Maybe they'd make for good motivation as a reward for making it to the potty on time.$1#$e#I think I'll go make some.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: It's pretty damp outside.#$e#Maybe we don't have to try so hard to get to the potty today.#$b#Just for today, okay?$4
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Hi, honey! I did some shopping this morning and got this for you.[186 180 770 535]#$e#I picked up some more supplies, just in case.$11
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I was just thinking about that night we met in the bathhouse.$l#$e#I'll never forget that night...$l
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: On days like this, I love to curl up with a good book.#$e#Do you want to sit with me?#$b#I could read to you, would you like that?$11
Entries.patio_Penny: This is a lot more peaceful than my old spot in town. I'm very happy here.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Hello there @. Have you been making it to the potty today?#$b#$y 'Can you try to go potty for me right now please?_Try using the potty._%Penny watches while you tinkle into the potty. She looks very proud of you._Go right were you stand._Goodness, that sure didn't look like you were trying very hard @.$4'
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: Oh goodness @, your cloths are soaked! Have you been playing in the rain all day?$1#$e#You seem to be very pleased for such a muddy little boy.^You seem to be very pleased for such a muddy little girl.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: %Penny puts a comforting hand on your shoulder.#$b#@, I know how the rain can make getting to the potty harder. I won't be upset at any accidents tonight, I promise.#$b#In fact, I'm never upset about your accidents.$1#$b#They just make you look even more precious.$11
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: The sound of rain used to bother me, when I lived in that old metal trailer.$2#$b#But it's quite soothing here.#$e#If you're done with chores for the day we could sit on the porch together and just listen to the rain.#$b#Common, let's get your bed time diaper on early. We don't have to worry about that until tomorrow.$11
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I felt like making a nice dinner. I hope you like it. [212 214 225 209 200]$h#$e#You don't need me to feed it to you, do you?$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: It's so peaceful here. I used to have the most horrific nightmares, but now I sleep like a baby.#$e#Well, not quite as much of a baby as you.$1#$b#Are you ready to change out of your night time diaper?
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, @! I made you a hot breakfast.[195 210 211]#$e#It's important to me that you leave here with a full belly.$h#$e#Don't forget to use the potty before you go out @.#$b#You don't want that full tummy turning into full pants now, do you?$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: You know, I think I'll read a book today. I picked up something new from the library last time I was there.#$e#I also picked up some picture books if you'd like me to read to you tonight.$4
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I love to hear about all the artifacts you've found. Archaeology is fascinating!#$e#To think... there may have been farmers at this very spot 10,000 years ago.
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Was I shy when we first met? It's funny to think about.#$b#It's hard to feel shy around someone when you've changed their pants so many times!$1#$e#How about we don't worry about the potty today. How's that sound @?#$b#Would you want to be a little boy, just for today?#$11#^Would you want to be a little girl, just for today?#$11#
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Good evening, honey. Did you do a good job making it to the potty today?$3#$e#If not, that's okay. We've got all the time in the world!
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Hello there @. I would like to hear all about your day.#$b#$y 'But first, can you try to go potty for me right now please?_Try using the potty._Look at you! Using the potty like a big kid. Good job!$!._Go right were you stand._%Penny sighs and rolls her eyes, but she doesn't hide her little grin at your antics.'
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: @, I'm proud of you for trying to use the potty, even though it's hard.#$e#How about, just for tonight, we get your night time diaper on early and you don't have to worry about it until tomorrow.$4#$b#We can just curl up together and I can read you some stories. How's that sound?$11
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: You're my special boy, did you know that?^You're my special girl, did you know that?$%e$%Penny pull you in for a hug and gently rubs your back.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Ready to tuck in? I made the bed and everything...#$b#Let's get your night time diaper on first though.$11
Entries.Outdoor_0: It's so peaceful here. I used to have the most horrific nightmares, but now I sleep like a baby.#$e#Well, not quite as much of a baby as you.$1#$b#Are you ready to change out of your night time diaper?
Entries.Outdoor_1: I would've been so happy growing up on a farm.#$b#I guess I can see why you're so hesitant to grow up.$1
Entries.Outdoor_2: Hi, honey! I'll watch for a bit if you want to go play.#$b#%Penny ruffles your hair affectionately.
Entries.Outdoor_3: Now @, I know the farm can be very distracting. I mean, just look at it!$1#$b#Try and listen to your body though, okay? If it says you need the potty then come in right away.
Entries.Outdoor_4: It's really nice outside. I think I'll read a book on the porch today. I picked up something new from the library last time I was there.#$e#I also picked up some picture books if you'd like me to read to you tonight.$4
Entries.OneKid_0: Have you had any time to play with %kid1 today?#$b#You're already so good at playing, it must be pretty easy for you!$1
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to have such a great childhood here.
Entries.OneKid_3: I feel a lot older now that we have a child. Maybe it's just this new responsibility weighing on me.#$e#It's not bad! I've wanted this for a long time.$11#$b#And I've already had some good practice changing diapers.$4
Entries.TwoKids_0: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their food. They're such hungry children!#$b#That's certainly ONE of the reasons the diaper budget is so high.$1
Entries.TwoKids_1: We have to make sure and give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
Entries.TwoKids_2: I've had this dream that %kid2 grew wings and flew into the night sky. What does it mean?
Entries.TwoKids_3: A nice house, two wonderful kids, and a beautiful plot of land. We're so very fortunate.
Entries.Good_1: I had dreams of marrying you for such a long time.#$e#I also had dreams where you were just a tiny baby. I'm surprised both of them came true!$1
Entries.Good_2: I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here.#$b#Now how about we go change your night time diaper.
Entries.Good_3: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you shave?$l^Wow, you look beautiful today. Did you do something different with your hair?$l
Entries.Good_4: This place is really starting to feel like home.#$b#It probably helps that it already smelled like a nursery!$1
Entries.Good_6: You look so precious in your night time diapers!$1#$e#Did you know you sometimes suck your thumb at night?#$b#You were so cute I couldn't stand it.$11
Entries.jobLeave_Penny: I have to go into town today.#$b#$c .5#Make sure you try your best to make it to the potty, okay? I love you.#$e#Do you need help changing out of your night time diaper before I go?$4
Entries.jobReturn_Penny: #$c .6#Good evening. My day was fine, thanks! How was yours?$h#$e#Jas and Vincent weren't behaving very well today. I'm still all wound up...
Entries.funLeave_Penny: I'm going to head into town today, just for fun. I'll be back in a while!
Entries.funReturn_Penny: I had a nice time... It's good to stay in contact with everyone. Tell me about your day.
Entries.spring_8: Spring is probably my favorite season. There's a certain freshness in the air that fills me with hope.
Entries.spring_1: We've got a long, warm year to look forward to. Let's make it a productive one.
Entries.spring_15: Ah, the 'spring cleaning'... I'm actually going to enjoy this.
Entries.spring_3: #$p 102#I wonder if Maru and Dr. Harvey will ever get together? I'm sure Harvey likes her...|Jas is trying to use the potty. She really is. She's still not that great at it...$3#$e#I almost wanted to put her back in diapers yesterday just so it'd be easier to deal with.$1#$e#I'd never do that to her though, she tries so hard to earn her pull ups.
Entries.spring_12: #$p 102#Are you excited for the Egg Festival tomorrow?|Vincent and Jas are really excited for the Egg Festival tomorrow.#$b#Jas got so excited talking about it that she had an accident.$3#$b#Vincent probably did too, but he was already wet, so I'd have no way of knowing!$1
Entries.spring_16: #$p 102#Hmm... maybe I should experiment with a new recipe. You liked the last recipe I made, didn't you, honey?|Tutoring Vincent and Jas can be a handful, especially with their potty issues.$3#$b#It doesn't bother me though, it's just another skill I can help them work on.#$e#At least, if I could get Vincent to work on it at all...$2
Entries.summer_16: *phew*... I need to eat more melon to combat this heat!
Entries.summer_1: Summer may be searing hot, but the humidity feels great on the skin.
Entries.summer_2: In summer, the ants become very active. I could watch them for hours... they have a pretty complex civilization from the looks of it!
Entries.summer_10: #$p 102#I'm excited to tutor Vincent and Jas today.|*Sigh* Vincent convinced Jas to use her pull up yesterday...$5#$e#It's hard to get him to take the potty seriously, but Jas has been trying really hard.$3#$b#Though, I don't think she would have made it this time anyway. She ended up making quite the mess.$2#$b#She seemed more relieved than embarrassed, so I guess it's okay.
Entries.summer_24: #$p 102#I wonder if Maru and Dr. Harvey will ever get together? I'm sure Harvey likes her...|Vincent used his diapers yesterday as usual.$3#$e#I know he can tell when he does it, but he never tells me when he's wet or messy.$5#$b#I swear that boy prefers to sit around in his used diapers.$1
Entries.fall_5: The smell of fall reminds me of the smell of books... weird, isn't it?
Entries.fall_1: Fall... It makes me think of colored paper and glue. Maybe I'm spending too much time with the children.$h
Entries.fall_2: Will you grow any giant pumpkins this year?$11#$e#I'd consider planting them now a great birthday present!$1
Entries.fall_11: #$p 102#I wonder if Maru and Dr. Harvey will ever get together? I'm sure Harvey likes her...|Jas is trying to use the potty. She really is. She's still not that great at it...$3#$e#I almost wanted to put her back in diapers yesterday just so it'd be easier to deal with.$1#$e#I'd never do that to her though, she tries so hard to earn her pull ups.
Entries.fall_23: #$p 102#Hmm... maybe I should experiment with a new recipe. You liked the last recipe I made, didn't you, honey?|Tutoring Vincent and Jas can be a handful, especially with their potty issues.$3#$b#It doesn't bother me though, it's just another skill I can help them work on.#$e#At least, if I could get Vincent to work on it at all...$2
Entries.winter_1: Winter's a good time to unwind a bit. You deserve it after the long year!
Entries.winter_6: The falling snow reminds me of grandma, rocking by the fire. I have this vivid memory of her shadow, flickering against the orange wood... That was long ago.
Entries.winter_3: If you're having lots of fun playing in the snow, I'd understand if you had a little accident.$4
Entries.winter_10: #$p 102#I'm excited to tutor Vincent and Jas today.|*Sigh* Vincent convinced Jas to use her pull up yesterday...$5#$e#It's hard to get him to take the potty seriously, but Jas has been trying really hard.$3#$b#Though, I don't think she would have made it this time anyway. She ended up making quite the mess.$2#$b#She seemed more relieved than embarrassed, so I guess it's okay.
Entries.winter_24: #$p 102#I wonder if Maru and Dr. Harvey will ever get together? I'm sure Harvey likes her...|Vincent used his diapers yesterday as usual.$3#$e#I know he can tell when he does it, but he never tells me when he's wet or messy.$5#$b#I swear that boy prefers to sit around in his used diapers.$1
